column1: '''''The Fictitious Characters of C.S. Lewis and J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is the title of a study of [[C.S. Lewis]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The work includes the first appearance in print (pp. 125-6) of an autobiographical letter by Tolkien from [[1958]], later published as [[Letter 213]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Fictitious Characters of C.S. Lewis and J.R.R. Tolkien. 1972
